scripts.test-render-site: npm run prep && npm run build && node build/render.js examples/onepage/pureimage-readme.xml
scripts.test-render-features: npm run prep && npm run build && node build/render.js examples/features/features.xml
scripts.test-include: npm run prep && npm run build && node build/render.js examples/include/test.xml
scripts.test-youtube-embed: npm run prep && npm run build && node build/render.js examples/embed/youtube.xml
scripts.render: npm run prep && npm run build && node build/render.js
scripts.test-shiki: npm run prep && npm run build && node build/shiki-test.js
scripts.prep: rm -rf build && mkdir build && cp resources/* build/
scripts.release-patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish
